entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
